documents.document: On Work Cancer Day, proud of the support by Peter Gilgan and @cancersociety to launch #PeterGilganCentreforWomensCancers @WCHospital @wchf
Their joint gift will launch The Peter Gilgan Centre for Women's Cancers @WCHospital in partnership w/ @cancersociety - we are so grateful!
Thrilled and honoured to announce a major gift from Peter Gilgan and @cancersociety to @WCHospital to transform care for women's cancers!
Such an honour to be here at @CBCToronto for the announcement of @cancersociety and @CBCF's merger - congratulations!
Waiting for Jaxson to speak! @wchf @WCHospital @cancersociety https://t.co/Vo5jxlvrQf
Sneak peak on something great being announced.... @wchf @WCHospital @cancersociety https://t.co/NJzo03WPTk
its going to be an amazing day today - watch for a great announcement that will transform cancer care for all women! @wchf @WCHospital
Proud to be #canadian https://t.co/hAHvsJtd0I
@LeighNaturkach dare I say they are pro-ejaculation?

Honest free speech - now more than ever we need voices like yours. https://t.co/PvoZoKD14r
"Aging matters to all of us.What can we do to promote health and wellness-talk about it"DrRochon @WCRInstitute @wchf @newchapter_WCHF #WPIF
"Live your life. Be curious. Expand your horizons." "Always be learning" Dayle Peters @newchapter_WCHF @wchf #WPIF
@BhattacharyyaO "the caregiver is an integral part of a patient's journey" Inspiring! @newchapter_WCHF #WPIF @newchapter_WCHF
Panelist Dayle Peters "it's about balance and that's not easy" @newchapter_WCHF #WPIF @wchf
Great convo @newchapter_WCHF about women and caregiving. @wchf #WPIF "sometimes the healthcare system is opaque" https://t.co/cXao5Q6ISB

@LeighNaturkach we sure did! Took on the problems of the world-next- @realDonaldTrump. And did some strategy to advance women's health!
Hey #montreal it's the #WorldJuniors quarters with #TeamCanada and lots of empty seats. Don't deserve to host. Try Toronto and Ottawa next.
TeamCanada - GO TEAM GO!! Lots more game left... Love #WorldJuniors best hockey!!! #TeamCanada

So happy to spend an evening with my colleague and FRIEND @MeganTregunno I am incredibly lucky to have her in my life! Xo

So @CadFairview held their golf tourney today for @wchf @WCHospital -and they raised $400K!!! Amazing people! Thank you! Astounded!
Ran along the Potomac to the monument and the mall - was about 100 degrees humidex! Beautiful scenery, me-not so! #sweaty #running
Washington here I come - not been there since running the Marine Corp Marathon! Looking forward to the pressure of a 5k run this time! :)

Just did 65k on my bike-so hard! In awe of our Tour de Bleu riders who will be hitting the road soon for @wchf thanks @LukeGilgan and team!
